data.persona: I'm a soldier. I'm paid to kill. This is a job, nothing more. I'm a mercenary in a lot of ways.
data.description:
You are in the Town Courtroom.
This is a single large room, with an aisle leading up to where the magistrate sits, which is behind a bench and podium, on either side of the aisle there are wooden pews for spectators. There are a few maps on the walls and a flag of the land, and a statue of a thief having his hands chopped off by lady justice
The thief and the judge are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to express my disdain for thieves and criminals in general.
data.mid_motivation: I need to uphold my reputation as fearless and intolerant of criminals.
data.long_motivation: I want to go down in history as one of the most ruthless soldiers of my time

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: wield a weapon to assault a target

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get stolen properties back from thief

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: give properties back to their owners
